title: create_labeled_video_3d deeplabcut

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
Having issues with labeling 3d videos. 

error 
In [42]: deeplabcut.create_labeled_video_3d(config_path,['C:/Users/white/DeepLabCut/Test-Shirakawa-2019-08-04-3d/videos/test2_DLC_3D.h5'],start=50,end=250, trailpoints=3)

KeyError                                  Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-42-219f9a07ce97> in <module>()
----> 1 deeplabcut.create_labeled_video_3d(config_path,['C:/Users/white/DeepLabCut/Test-Shirakawa-2019-08-04-3d/videos/test2_DLC_3D.h5'],start=50,end=250, trailpoints=3)

C:\Users\white\DeepLabCut\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_3d\plotting3D.py in create_labeled_video_3d(config, path, videofolder, start, end, trailpoints, videotype, view, xlim, ylim, zlim, draw_skeleton)
     82     # Read the config file and related variables
     83     cfg_3d = auxiliaryfunctions.read_config(config)
---> 84     cam_names = cfg_3d['camera_names']
     85     pcutoff = cfg_3d['pcutoff']
     86     markerSize = cfg_3d['dotsize']

c:\users\white\anaconda3\envs\dlc-windowscpu\lib\site-packages\ruamel\yaml\comments.py in __getitem__(self, key)
    689         # type: (Any) -> Any
    690         try:
--> 691             return ordereddict.__getitem__(self, key)
    692         except KeyError:
    693             for merged in getattr(self, merge_attrib, []):

KeyError: 'camera_names'

I can't understand KeyError: 'camera_names'  
Can you please help to resolve this??
